abilities.description: When you paint your face and body to purify yourself before battle, roll +wits. On a strong hit, your spirit is pure. Take +2 momentum and add +1 the next time you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray}. On a weak hit, only take +1 momentum.

When you sprinkle yourself with ceremonial water mixed with the blood of fallen foes, roll +wits. On a strong hit, the next time you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} in a fight, you ignore all harm. On a weak hit, as above but reduce harm suffered by 2 instead.

When you perform qaqa, the ritual disemboweling of a fallen enemy to release its spirit, roll +heart. On a strong hit, the spirit honors your act. Take +2 momentum and +1 spirit. On a weak hit, the spirit gives you a warning. Ask the Oracle for the nature of the warning. Then, take +1 momentum and add +1 to the next move you make leveraging this knowledge.
